laboratory_examinations.findings: The liver has a homogeneous signal without focal mass lesion. No intra or extrahepatic biliary ductal dilation. The common duct measures up to 8 mm in diameter. A 7 mm cystic focus is seen adjacent to the pancreatic tail. Moderate-sized axial hiatal hernia present. Dominant left-sided renal cyst measures 3.7 cm.
AST, Alk phos, Tbilli, and lipase were elevated.
1.8 mg/dL (Ref Range: 1.6 - 2.6 mg/dL), within normal range.
